flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=912>>912 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 912 = <<1/8*912=114>>114 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 114 x 3 = <<114*3=342>>342 pounds.
He now weighs 912 - 342 = <<912-342=570>>570 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 570 = <<156-570=-414>>-414 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 912. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
